results.title: Amlodipine rescues advanced iron overload cardiomyopathy in hemojuvelin knockout murine model: Clinical implications
results.text_hl: In addition, the morphometric index of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@hypertrophy@@@, LV mass adjusted by tibia length (LV/TL), was increased in the @CHEMICAL_Iron @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007501 @@@iron@@@ group but normalized in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@-treated group treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ (Figure 3B).

citations.NLM: Zhabyeyev P, Sadasivan C, Shah S, Wang F, Oudit GY. Amlodipine rescues advanced iron overload cardiomyopathy in hemojuvelin knockout murine model: Clinical implications Front Cardiovasc Med. 2023;10():1129349. PMID: 37153462

results.title: Preparation of a new component group of Ginkgo biloba leaves and investigation of the antihypertensive effects in spontaneously hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: The @DISEASE_Hypotension @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotensive@@@ activity of GBLCG (4.4 mg/kg) group was better than that of GBE group (p < 0.05), and the effect of improving @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@myocardial hypertrophy@@@ was better than that of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine besylate@@@ group (p < 0.01).

citations.NLM: Liang H, Yuan X, Sun C, Sun Y, Yang M, Feng S, Yao J, Liu Z, Zhang G, Li F. Preparation of a new component group of Ginkgo biloba leaves and investigation of the antihypertensive effects in spontaneously hypertensive rats. Biomed Pharmacother. 2022 May;149():112805. PMID: 35276465
citations.BibTeX: @article{35276465, title={Preparation of a new component group of Ginkgo biloba leaves and investigation of the antihypertensive effects in spontaneously hypertensive rats.}, author={Liang H and Yuan X and Sun C and Sun Y and Yang M and Feng S and Yao J and Liu Z and Zhang G and Li F}, journal={Biomed Pharmacother}, volume={149}, pages={112805}}

results.title: Folic acid enhances the cardiovascular protective effect of amlodipine in renal hypertensive rats with elevated homocysteine.
results.text_hl: In @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ group, the @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ hemodynamics (LVSP, LVEDP and +-dp/dtmax, et al.) and @DISEASE_Vascular_System_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D057772 @@@vascular damage@@@ were significantly reduced, while in amlodipine-FA group, the heart @DISEASE_Conversion_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003291 @@@function@@@ were further improved, and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@myocardial and vascular hypertrophy@@@ were significantly reduced.

citations.NLM: Li L, Tong X, Ma Z, Lv L, Liu H, Chen GL. Folic acid enhances the cardiovascular protective effect of amlodipine in renal hypertensive rats with elevated homocysteine. Clin Exp Hypertens. 2023 Dec 31;45(1):2205058. PMID: 37154141

results.title: Drug safety evaluation of amlodipine.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@, besides being effective on @DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricular hypertrophy@@@, appears beneficial in slowing down the progression of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@carotid hypertrophy@@@ and @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@, and can be used in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina pectoris@@@, even if the first choice for @DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina@@@ treatment is beta-blockers.

citations.NLM: Derosa G, Maffioli P. Drug safety evaluation of amlodipine. Expert Opin Drug Saf. 2011 Sep;10(5):795-804. PMID: 21591999
citations.BibTeX: @article{21591999, title={Drug safety evaluation of amlodipine.}, author={Derosa G and Maffioli P}, journal={Expert Opin Drug Saf}, volume={10}, number={5}, pages={795-804}}

results.title: Effect of amlodipine on mesangial cell proliferation and protein synthesis.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ was found to inhibit @DISEASE_Hyperplasia @DISEASE_MESH:D006965 @@@hyperplasia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@hypertrophy@@@ in mesangial cells.

citations.NLM: Shultz PJ, Raij L. Effect of amlodipine on mesangial cell proliferation and protein synthesis. Am J Hypertens. 1992 Dec;5(12 Pt 1):912-4. PMID: 1285940

results.title: Cardiac hypertrophy during hypercholesterolemia and its amelioration with rosuvastatin and amlodipine.
results.text_hl: Most importantly, @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ ameliorate @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@cardiomyocyte hypertrophy@@@ and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@.
